entry.title: Sauce Labs Planned Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 9, 18:00 - 20:00 UTC

Oct 11, 23:40 UTC
Scheduled - Sauce Labs will have a two hour previously scheduled maintenance window on November 9th, starting at 18:00 UTC and ending at 20:00 UTC. During this maintenance window, we will be making updates to our infrastructure and services in our US East data center. These maintenance actions may cause portions of the service (including running automated and manual tests) to be unavailable for up to two hours.

entry.title: 2024-October-11 Resolved Service Incident 2
entry.content:
Oct 11, 19:26 UTC
Resolved - Between 9:33 and 19:21 UTC, Real Device tests running via Sauce Connect tunnel (version 5) experienced failures on US-West-1 and EU-Central-1 and US-East-4 Data centers. We have identified the issue and taken remedial action.

entry.title: 2024-October-11 Resolved Service Incident
entry.content:
Oct 11, 05:00 UTC
Resolved - Between 04:30 and 04:57 UTC, we were experiencing elevated error rates and reduced device availability for Real device tests in our US-East data center. The issue is now resolved. All services are fully operational.

Oct 1, 20:48 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 1, 18:20 UTC

Oct 1, 17:06 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor the status and update once the third party issue is resolved

Oct 1, 16:56 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor the status and update once the third party issue is resolved

Oct 1, 16:32 UTC
Identified - A third party provider is currently experiencing an outage which is impacting support.saucelabs.com. If this is an emergency and you wish to reach Sauce Labs Support team, please email us at support.outage@saucelabs.com.

entry.title: 2024-September-30 Resolved Service Incident
entry.content:
Sep 30, 16:41 UTC
Resolved - Between 15:53 - 16:11 UTC, Sauce Labs dashboard was unavailable in our EU Data Center. The access has been restored and all services are operational.

entry.title: 2024-09-15 Resolved Service Incident
entry.content:
Sep 15, 17:00 UTC
Resolved - Between 17:02 and 20:15 UTC, automated tests executed on our real devices in the US West Data Center experienced an increased error rate due to reduced availability of the devices. The issue has been identified. All services are back to normal.

entry.title: 2024-June-7 Service Incident
entry.content:
Jun 7, 13:56 UTC
Resolved - After taking remedial action, Sauce Connect 4 tunnels are starting successfully in our US-West data center. All services are fully operational.

Jun 7, 13:52 UTC
Monitoring - We have fixed the root cause, and Sauce Connect 4 tunnels are starting successfully in our US-West data center. We are monitoring.

Jun 7, 13:40 UTC
Identified - We have identified the root cause and are working on implementing a fix.

Jun 7, 12:52 UTC
Investigating - Sauce Connect 4 tunnels are intermittently failing to start in our US-West data center. We are investigating.
